lead_paragraph: David Backes and Kyle Brodziak scored in the second period to lead the St. Louis Blues to a 5-2 victory over the short-handed Carolina Hurricanes on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Backes, Brodziak Lead Blues Past Hurricanes, 5-2
headline.main: Backes, Brodziak Lead Blues Past Hurricanes, 5-2

snippet: David Backes and Kyle Brodziak scored in the second period to lead the St. Louis Blues to a 5-2 victory over the short-handed Carolina Hurricanes on Sunday....
